description technical detail:
NEC MultiSync PA241W-WH - 24" - Full HD LCD Monitor
The NEC MultiSync PA241W delivers uncompromising image quality as well as minimizing life-cycle environmental impact. Uniting outstanding color reproduction, class-leading ergonomics, an in-built carbon savings meter, ambient light sensor and 10-bit P-IPS LCD performance makes it ideal for creative professionals.
The ideal display for all creative professionals, designers, photographers, precision engineers and anyone who cares about their visual work.
features: Picture in picture, CableComp, Ambix, AutoBright, power off timer, TileMatrix, NaViSet, ColorComp, AmbiBright, Eco-Mode, Overdrive technology
